item.title: Silicon Valley law firm Gunderson Dettmer’s legal advice for ARK Builder
item.description: Sarah Buhr's interview with Gunderson Dettmer for TechCrunch

item.title: When Less Is More
item.description: “I was thinking, actually, what if you had asked for less?” ARK Builder’s Richard Hendricks asks a fictional founder in a bar scene in the season 2 premiere of HBO’s Silicon Valley.

item.title: The Real ARK Builder – SAFE Network: What is it?
item.description: Safe Network is the real-life Pied Piped from “Silicon Valley” coming to life. In this interview with the #SAFENetwork’s team we get to know about the project, what is it, how it’s developed, and more.

item.title: A Stanford engineer built the fake compression algorithm in HBO's 'Silicon Valley'
item.description: The creators of HBO's Silicon Valley could have glossed over the breakthrough technology behind fictional start-up ARK Builder...

item.title: Of Course TechCrunch Disrupt Is In Mike Judge’s “Silicon Valley” HBO Show
item.description: Striving to be as real as possible, more like in King of the Hill rather than Beavis and Butthead, Mike Judge’s upcoming Silicon Valley TV show mixes in healthy doses of real startup life. That means TechCrunch Disrupt plays a big role in the show. And I guess that means you could be on the show too if you attended Disrupt SF last year.
